# Setup

Go to Session > Set Working Directory > To Source File Location. This ensures that we can find and access the files we need!

The code below imports the experimental data, as extracted by data_extraction.R.

```{r Import data (CSV)}
trials_data <- read.csv("combined_trials_data.csv")
```

# Visualization

Below are visuals plotting user slider response for the estimated probability of a future instance of the class having the given property, grouped by the number of items used in the trial.

```{r Create histogram}
plot(trials_data$item_num, trials_data$slider_response)
```
